original_title: The Fantastic History of the Ugly Duckling
overview: You might have already heard the classic Hans Christian Andersen story about the ugly duckling that turns into a beautiful swan. But you've never heard it quite like this kid-friendly reinvention that puts a new spin on a beloved fairy tale. This time around, the so-called "duckling" has a silly pig of a friend to pal around with. Viewers will also learn the surprising truth about why a baby swan was mistaken for a duck in the first place.
title: The Fantastic History of the Ugly Duckling
